No futuro deseja concluir e mobilar a sua casa, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é conseguir juntar o fundo aos poucos para poder realizar seus projectos.
texts.en: Armando is married and is the father of five children, three of whom are already adults.  He lives in his own home with his family and also supports his grandchildren, who live with him.  He is a mason by profession.  He will use this loan to buy construction materials (cement, bricks, sand, stone, iron, etc.) to expand his home.  In the future, he hopes to finish and to furnish his home.  To do this, he promises to make his payments on time so he can request more loans from Hluvuku.  His challenge is gathering funds little by little to carry out his projects.

loans.use: to buy construction materials (cement, bricks, sand, stone, iron, etc.) to expand his home.

loans.name: Salvador

texts.pt:
Solteiro e sem filhos, vive na casa dos pais e sustenta seus irmãos em produtos alimentares que vivem com ele. 	
Trabalha numa empresa de distribuição de água FIPAG em Boane. Com o presente empréstimo pretende pagar a legalização do seu terreno. 
No futuro deseja construir casa própria e iniciar uma actividade comercial, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a falta de fundos de investimento e aumento do seu nível académico.
texts.en: Salvador is single an doesn't have children.  He lives in his parents' home and supports his siblings by buying food for the ones that live with him.  He works at a water distributing country in Boane called FIPAG.  With his current loan, he will buy the title to his land.  In the future, he hopes to build his own home and to start a business.  To do this, he promises to make his payments on time so he can request more loans from Hluvuku.  His challenges are the lack of investment funds and increasing his level of education.

loans.use: to pay for the title to his land.

loans.name: Carlos

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 5 filhos, 1 já maior de idade, vive na casa própria e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
Trabalha como técnico Administrativo numa instituição do Estado. Com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material eléctrico para fazer a instalação eléctrica a sua casa. 
No futuro pretende construir outra residência e casar oficialmente, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é terminar a sua faculdade.
texts.en: Carlos is married and is the father of five children, one of whom is an adult.  He lives in his own home and doesn't support anyone besides his family.  He works as an administrative worker for a state institution.  He will use this loan to buy electric materials to install electricity in his house.  In the future, he wants to build another home and to buy his marriage license.  To do this, he promises to make his payments on time so he can request more loans from Hluvuku.  His challenge is to finish college.

loans.use: to buy electric materials to install electricity in his home.

loans.name: Ablamvi Théophile

texts.fr: Conducteur de taxi-moto, Ablamvi Théophile est marié à une revendeuse et ils ont 04 enfants tous des écoliers. L’ainé a 15ans et le dernier 07ans. Il sollicite un troisième crédit à WAGES pour s’acheter une nouvelle moto. Il voudrait à l’avenir, assurer les besoins primaires de la famille et ajouter d’autres activités complémentaires. Notons qu’il est âgé de 38ans et a une ancienneté de 06ans dans l’activité.
texts.en:
Ablamvi Théophile is a motorbike taxi driver. 

He is married to a retailer and they have four children, all in school. The eldest is 15 years old and the youngest is 7 years old. 

Ablamvi Théophile is asking for a third loan from WAGES to buy himself a new motorbike. 

He would like, in the future, to ensure the needs of his family are met and take up some other types of work. 

Note that Ablamvi Théophile is 38 years old and has 6 years experience as a motorbike taxi-driver.

loans.use: to buy a motorbike

loans.name: Zaratu

texts.fr: Jeune dame de 28ans, Zaratu est mère de 02 enfants et mariée à un revendeur. Son ainé de 06ans est scolarisé et le dernier de 03ans ne va pas encore à l’école. Elle est revendeuse de produits d’alimentation générale depuis 2009 et s’approvisionne à Lomé. Elle est aidée par 01 personne. Avec ce premier prêt qu’elle sollicite, Zaratu va s’acheter des produits de premières nécessités, tirer un profit et assurer les besoins vitaux de la famille.
texts.en:
A young woman of 28 years old, Zaratu is a mother of two children and is married to a retailer. Her eldest child is 6 years old and goes to school. The younger child is 3 years old and does not yet go to school. 

Zaratu has been a retailer of general food products since 2009. She procures her supplies in Lomé. She is helped by one other person. 

With this first loan, Zaratu is going to buy staple goods, earn a profit and meet the basic needs of her family.

loans.use: to buy general food products

loans.name: Abra

texts.fr: Âgée de 33ans, Madame abra est mariée à un soudeur. Ils ont 03 enfants dont 02 sur les bancs de l’école. Le premier a 10ans et le dernier 04ans. Elle est revendeuse de céréales dans un marché de la ville et s’approvisionne à Lomé et dans les marchés de l’intérieur. C’est depuis 1997 qu’elle a démarré l’activité et elle se plait bien car cela lui procure des revenus lui permettant d’aider son mari dans les charges du foyer. Pour mieux répondre aux besoins des clients, elle sollicite un second crédit à WAGES. Avec les profits, elle prévoit agrandir l’activité, avoir d’autres points de vente et assurer l’épanouissement de la famille.
texts.en:
Aged 33 years old, Abra is married to a welder. They have 3 children, two of whom go to school. The oldest child is 10 years old and the youngest is 4 years old.

Abra sells cereals in a village market. She procures her supplies in Lomé and in the markets of the interior. She has been in this business since 1997. She is pleased because she earns income that allows her to help her husband with the household expenses. 

To better respond to the needs of her clients, Abra is asking for a second loan through WAGES. She plans to use profits to expand her business, have other sales outlets, and to ensure the livelihood of her family.

loans.use: to buy cereals

loans.name: Komlavi

texts.fr: Marié à une revendeuse et père d’01 enfant d'01 an. Komlanvi âgé de 24ans est revendeur.  Il vend depuis 2009 des télévisions et autres appareils électroniques dans une boutique de la place. Il est aidé par 01 personne et sollicite un premier prêt chez nous(WAGES) pour s’approvisionner en marchandises afin de répondre aux besoins des clients. Il voudrait diversifier sa marchandise tout en assurant les besoins primaires de la famille.
texts.en:
Komlavi is married to a retailer and a father of a one-year-old child. He is 24 years old and is a retailer.

He has been selling televisions and other electronics in local shop since 2009. He is helped by one person.

Komlavi is asking for this first loan with us (WAGES) to procure goods in order to respond to the needs of his customers. 

He would like to diversify his merchandise, while providing for the basic needs of his family.

loans.use: to buy televisions and electronics

loans.name: Yaovi

texts.fr: Soudeur ferrailleur de profession, mr Yaovi est marié à une revendeuse. Ils ont 01 enfant de 08 mois. A la fin de son apprentissage, il a ouvert un atelier dans un quartier de la place ou il exerce son activité. Il est par moment confronté à la concurrence et pour pallier ce problème, il sollicite de WAGES un second crédit pour acheter des matériels de soudure. Avec les profits réalisés, il voudrait réinvestir dans l’activité tout en prenant soin de sa famille. Notons qu’il est dans ce domaine il y a 05ans.
texts.en: An iron welder by profession, Mr. Yaovi is married to a retailer. They have one child who is 8 months old. At the end of his apprenticeship, he opened a workshop in an area of the place where he practices his business. At times, he is confronted with competition, and, to compensate for this problem, he is asking WAGES for a second loan to buy welding materials. With the profits he makes, he would like to reinvest in his business, while also taking care of his family. Let's note that he has worked in this business for five years.

loans.use: to buy welding materials.

loans.name: Philippe

texts.fr: Couturier de profession, Philippe est âgé de 33ans est père de 03 enfants dont 02 scolarisés. Le premier a 11ans et le dernier 06ans. Sa femme est coiffeuse. Après sa formation, il a ouvert un atelier en 2004 dans lequel il coud les habits. En plus de la couture, il vend des produits de mercerie. C’est dans le but d’augmenter son stock de mercerie qu’il sollicite ce second crédit à WAGES. Comme perspectives d’avenir, il voudrait assurer les besoins primaires de la famille et agrandir l’activité.
texts.en: A clothing maker by profession, Philippe is 33 years old and the father of three children, two of whom are in school. The oldest is 11 and the youngest is 6. His wife is a hairdresser. After completing his training, he opened a workshop in 2004 where he sews clothing. In addition to sewing, he sells sewing supplies. With the goal of increasing his stock of sewing supplies, he is asking for a second loan from WAGES. In the future, he would like to provide for the basic needs of his family and grow his business.

loans.use: to buy sewing supplies.

loans.name: Topi Group

texts.en:
Shebu, who is in her early 40s, is married with two children who are still going to school.  She has been making a living by selling new clothes door-to-door. She works from 8:00 am to 8:00 pm daily and is able to make a good monthly profit. 

This is going to be her second loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She used the previous loan to buy more clothes to resell and has paid back her loan successfully.  She wants a loan to buy more clothes to resell and to pay school fees for her children.  Her dream is to one day be able to own a food cafe.

Shebu will share this loan with her loan group, Topi, which has a total of 15 members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy more clothes to resell and to pay school fees for her children.

loans.name: Saiberia Group

texts.en:
Nuru is in her early 30s.  She is living with a man and has two boys, one in school and the other a baby.  She has been running a food shop for four years now.  She works from 8am to 9pm daily and is able to make a fair profit.

This will be her 5th loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  She used the previous loans to restock existing and missing items in the food shop, and to cover school fees and household expenses.  She has paid back all of her loans successfully.  She hopes for a loan to restock more food items, to pay school fees and to finish building her family house.  Her dream is to one day be able to own a big beauty salon.

She will share this loan with her loan group, Saiberia, which totals 11 members.  They will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to restock the missing items in her shop

loans.name: Marte

texts.en:
Marte is 29 years old and married.  She lives with her husband and his elderly parents in a rural district in the northern part of Albania.  They have been active with livestock for the past eight years and have 3 pigs, 13 sheep, and 2 milk cows.  The earnings from this activity have been good and the parents have a decent pension resulting from high-paying jobs prior to their retirement.
Marte and her husband are also educated, but have not been able to find any jobs in their field or similar one.  As a result, their only focus is on the same livestock activity.

Marte has been scheduled for a surgery soon and needs money immediately in order to pay the hospital expenses.  Her promise to lenders is that she will pay the loan back on the scheduled days because she is responsible.

loans.use: to have surgery

loans.name: Anani

texts.fr: Père de 05 enfants tous scolarisés, mr Anani est marié à une revendeuse et il est âgé de 52ans. Il est mécanicien de profession et répare les gros engins dans son atelier depuis 1988. Pour éviter la concurrence dont il est confronté par moment,  il demande l’aide de WAGES pour acheter de la caisse à outil pour mieux répondre aux besoins des clients. Avec le profit qu’il réalisera, il veut assurer une bonne éducation à sa famille et agrandir son activité.
texts.en:
Anani is 52 years old and father of five children, all of whom have received schooling. He is married to a retailer.

He is a mechanic by trade and has been repairing large vehicles in his workshop since 1968. In order to avoid the competition that he is sometimes confronted with, he is seeking a loan from WAGES to buy a toolbox so that he can better satisfy his clients' needs.

With the profits, he wants to expand his business and ensure a good education for his family.

loans.use: to buy a toolbox

loans.name: Adjo

texts.fr: Adjo est âgée de 37ans. Elle est mère de 03 enfants dont 02 scolarisés. Ils sont âgés de 10 à 05ans. Elle est infirmière de profession et exerce l’activité à domicile depuis 1999. Afin de bien répondre aux besoins des patients, elle vend en même temps des produits pharmaceutiques et c’est pour l’achat de ses produits qu’elle sollicite un cinquième crédit à WAGES. Elle veut avoir une famille épanouie et agrandir son activité.
texts.en: Adjo is 37 years old. She has three children of which two attend school. They are between ten and five years old. She is a nurse by profession and has been working at home since 1999. In order to cover her patients' needs, she sells pharmaceutical products at the same time. It is for the purchase of these products that she requests a fifth loan from WAGES. She wants to have a happy, well adjusted family and expand her business.

loans.use: To buy pharmaceutical products

loans.name: Komlanvi

texts.fr: Agé de 25ans, célibataire et sans enfant, Komlanvi est revendeur de chaussures. Il mène cette activité depuis 2009 et il l’expose sur étalage devant le domicile. Komlanvi est confronté à la concurrence et pour remédier à cela, il sollicite l’aide de WAGES par un premier prêt pour acheter plus de chaussures afin de garder ses clients. Avec les profits qu’il récoltera de sa vente, il veut fonder un foyer tout en gardant la pérennité de son activité.
texts.en: Aged 25, unmarried and childless, Komlanvi sells shoes. He has been in this business since 2009 and he displays his merchandise on a stand in front of his house. Komlanvi is confronted with competition and to find a solution to this, he requests the help of WAGES for a first loan to buy more shoes, so that he can keep his clients. With the profits that he will make from his sales, he wants to set up home at the same time as maintaining the durability of his business.

loans.use: To buy shoes.

loans.name: Doh

texts.fr: Mr Doh est âgé de 41ans. Il à pour femme une cuisinière et est père de famille. Pour assurer les besoins de la famille, il a commencé par vendre depuis 2010 des produits congelés dans une boutique. La demande devient de plus en plus grande et n’arrivant plus à répondre aux besoins des clients, il sollicite auprès de WAGES un premier  prêt pour s’approvisionner en marchandises. Comme perspectives d’avenir, il souhaite multiplier ses points de vente et rendre plus heureuse sa famille.
texts.en: Mr. Doh is 41 years old. His wife is a cook, and he is a father with a family. To ensure that family needs are met, he started a business in 2010 selling frozen foods in a shop. The demand is growing stronger and stronger, thus he no longer can meet the demands of his customers. He is requesting an initial loan from WAGES to stock up on goods. For the future, he would like to increase the number of his sales outlets and to make his family happy.

loans.use: to purchase frozen foods to sell

loans.name: Essi

texts.fr: Essi célibataire de 30ans vit à Lomé. Elle vend dans une boutique des garnitures pour enfants, des mèches et d’autres produits depuis 2005. Pour agrandir son activité, elle sollicite un troisième prêt de WAGES pour acheter des marchandises.(garnitures pour enfant et mèches). Elle désire se marier plus tard et garder son activité  pérenne.
texts.en: Essi is 30 years old, unmarried, and living in Lomé. She has been selling baby supplies, hair extensions, and other products in a shop since 2005. To expand her business, she is requesting a third loan from WAGES to purchase some merchandise (baby supplies and hair extensions). She would like to get married later on and to sustain her business.

loans.use: to purchase baby supplies and hair extensions to sell

loans.name: Gérard

texts.fr: Revendeur des produits d’alimentation générale dans une boutique depuis 2009, Gérard âgé de 39ans est aidé par sa femme dans l’exécution de ses taches. Afin de rendre son activité pérenne, il vient auprès de WAGES pour avoir un prêt afin d’acheter des produits de premières nécessités tels que  riz, sucre, huile végétale, tomate en boite et autre. A l’avenir, il veut agrandir l’activité et avoir une famille épanouie. Notons  qu’il est père de 02 enfants âgés de 05 et 01an et que seul l’ainé va pour le moment à l’école.
texts.en: A retailer in grocery store 2009, Gérard, aged 39, is helped by his wife in carrying out his tasks. To sustain his business, he is here at WAGES to obtain a loan to purchase basic goods, such as rice, sugar, vegetable oil, canned tomatoes, and more. For the future, he wants to expand his business and have a thriving family. Let us note that he is a father of two children, aged 5 and 1 years old, and the oldest is the only one going to school at the moment.

loans.use: to purchase grocery items for his store

loans.name: Akou

texts.fr: Akou est revendeuse d’articles scolaires et des boisons alcoolisées depuis 2009. Elle s’approvisionne à Lomé et revend dans une boutique à ses clients. Âgée de 26ans, elle est mère d’un enfant qui est scolarisé. Afin d’acheter plus de marchandises, elle sollicite un premier prêt à WAGES.  Son souhait est d’avoir une famille heureuse, bien éduquée et agrandir encore plus son activité.
texts.en: Akou has been a retailer of office supplies and alcoholic beverages since 2009. She gets her supplies from Lomé and sells to her customers in a shop. She is 26 years old and the mother of one child, who is in school. To purchase more merchandise, she is requesting an initial loan from WAGES. Her wish is to have a happy, well-educated family and to expand her business some more.

loans.use: to purchase office supplies and beverages to sell

loans.name: Médjélawè

texts.fr: Médjélawé est âgée de 30ans. Elle est mariée à un militaire et ils ont 01 enfant de 06 ans qui va à l’école. Pour aider son mari dans les charges du foyer, elle vend il y a 02ans des casseroles et des chaises en plastiques à toutes personnes à domicile. Elle exerce seule son activité et sollicite de WAGES un second crédit pour s’approvisionner en marchandises. Avec les profits, elle veut réinvestir dans l’activité et assurer au coté de son mari l’éducation de son enfants.
texts.en: Médjélawé is 30 years old. She is married to a soldier, and they have one child, who is 6 years old and in school. To help out her husband in covering household expenses, she has been selling pots and pans and plastic chairs for two years to anyone, out of her home. She does her work alone and is requesting a second WAGES loan to stock up on merchandise. With the profits, she wants to reinvest in her business and ensure along with her husband, that her children are educated.

loans.use: to purchase chairs and pots to sell

loans.name: Awali

texts.fr: Revendeur des produits d’alimentation générale dans une boutique depuis 2010, Awali âgé de 38ans exerce seul son activité. Afin de la rendre pérenne, il vient auprès de WAGES pour avoir un premier prêt afin d’acheter des produits de premières nécessités tels que  riz, sucre, huile végétale, tomate en boite et autre. A l’avenir, il veut agrandir l’activité et avoir une famille épanouie. Notons  qu’il est marié à une revendeuse, père d'01 enfant d’un an qui ne fréquente pas pour le moment.
texts.en: Awali, who is aged 38, works alone. He has been selling groceries in a shop since 2010. In order to make it sustainable, he comes to WAGES to request a first loan so as to buy basic stock such as rice, sugar, vegetable oil, tins of tomato and so on. In the future, he wants to expand his business and have a contented family. It should be mentioned that he is married to a saleswoman, and is the father of a child of one that he does not see frequently at present.

loans.use: To buy groceries.

loans.name: Abdoulaye

texts.fr:
Monsieur Abdoulaye est un transporteur  depuis 15 ans maintenant. Il possède un véhicule Mercédès avec lequel il travaille pour subvenir à ses besoins. Abdoulaye est mariée et père de famille, d’ailleurs c’est lui qui s’occupe de la dépense quotidienne du foyer.
Il commence sa journée à 8h et la termine à 17h du soir .Il vient solliciter un crédit de 200000F CFA pour la 1ère fois, afin de changer les quatre pneus de son véhicule. Avec le crédit, il pourra épargner et améliorer les conditions alimentaires  de son foyer.
En dehors de cette activité, Abdoulaye possède des terres qu’il veut exploiter  et y faire des cultures maraichères.
texts.en:
Abdoulaye has been a transporter for the past 15 years. He has a Mercedes vehicle which he works with in order to provide for his needs. He is married and a father, and it is he who takes care of the daily household expenses. He begins his day at 8 o'clock in the morning and finishes at 5 o'clock in the evening. He has just requested a 200,000FCFA loan for the first time so that he can change his vehicle's four tyres. With the loan, he will be able to save money and improve his family's nutrition. 

Aside from this activity, Abdoulay owns some land that he would like to farm and where he could grow market gardening produce.

loans.use: to buy tyres for his Mercedes vehicle which he uses for transport

loans.name: Ousmane

texts.fr:
Ousmane, un jeune cultivateur, possède un champ qu’il veut mettre en valeur. Il décide de demander de l’appui à l’IMCEC pour un crédit de 75000F CFA. Ousmane va acheter des semences de poivron et de tomate ; et veut aussi réfectionner son puits pour que l’exploitation soit plus facile. Il est expérimenté dans le domaine car il a fait maintenant plus de  10 ans d’activité.
Ousmane est marié et père de famille. N’étant pas le seul homme dans la maison, il ne fait que participer  à la dépense quotidienne. Si ses revenus augmentent, il envisage d’acquérir une machine moto pompe pour améliorer son exploitation.
texts.en:
Ousmane, a young farmer, owns a field which he would like to put to good use. He has decided to ask for financial support from IMCEC in the form of a 75,000FCFA loan. He is going to buy pepper and tomato seeds and would also like to repair his well to make his farming easier. He is experienced in this field as he has been doing it for more than ten years now.

Ousmane is married and a father. As he is not the only man in the house, he only has to pay a share of the daily expenses. If his income increases, he plans to acquire a motor pump to improve his farming.

loans.use: to buy pepper and tomato seeds and to repair his well.

loans.name: Binta

texts.fr:
La dame Binta, est une commerçante  depuis 5 ans maintenant. Elle s’active dans la vente de produits alimentaires et dispose d’une boutique d’alimentation générale. Elle vient solliciter un crédit de 150000F CFA pour acheter du riz, de l’huile, du lait, des détergents et d’autres produits divers.
Elle commence sa journée à 8h du matin et fini à 17h du soir.
Avec les revenus de son activité, elle réussi à appuyer son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes de la maison. Elle va pouvoir  épargner et améliorer les conditions alimentaires de la famille. Il aimerait comme projet futur, entamer les travaux de construction de son terrain.
texts.en:
This lady, Binta, has been a trader for the past five years. She sells groceries and has a general grocery store. She has just requested a loan of 150,000FCFA to buy rice, oil, detergents and various other products.

She begins her day at eight o'clock in the morning and finishes at 5 o'clock in the afternoon. With the income from her activity, she manages to help out her husband with the daily household expenses. She will be able to save money and improve her family's nutrition. In the future she would like to begin building on her land.

loans.use: to buy rice, oil, milk and sugar to stock up her shop.

loans.name: El Hadji Barra Sall

texts.fr:
Monsieur El Hadji Barra Sall est un jeune agriculteur qui exerce le métier depuis 10 ans. Il possède un champ ou il fait de la culture maraichère. Il a été pris en photo dans son espace cultural entrain de superviser les lieux. Il est à son 4ème crédit et demande un montant de 500000F CFA pour acheter deux  motos pompes pour son exploitation. Il s’occupe des dépenses quotidiennes du foyer. 
Comme projet futur, il désire exploiter d’autres périmètres agricoles pour maximiser son profit et pouvoir assurer toutes ses charges.
texts.en:
Mr. El Hadji Barra Sall is a young farmer with 10 years of experience. He owns some land, which he uses for market gardening. He is photographed on location supervising his farming activity. 

This is his 4th loan cycle, and he is seeking 500,000F CFA to buy two motorized pumps for his activity. He is responsible for the daily expenses of his household.

In the long term, he wishes to increase his cultivable land to maximize profits and cover all his expenses.

loans.use: to buy two motorized pumps for his farming activity.

loans.name: Saliou Dian's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe a été créé depuis le 30/05/2007.IL est composé de membres qui sont issus du même village.Elles ont pour activité principale la production de bananes.

Madame AISSATOU en position assise sur la photo à l'extrême gauche et levant la main droite,est la responsable du groupement.Elle est âgée de 36 ans,elle est mariée et mére de 03 enfants dont une fille.L'aîné est âgé de 15 ans tandis-que le plus petit a 07 ans.

Son activité consiste à vendre  de la banane qu'elle revend par la suite.Elle dispose d'une bonne expérience pour ce type d'activité. Elle achéte à chaque marché hebdomadaire 50kg de bananes à 16 500f pour les revendre.

Son objectif est d'assurer la nourriture quotidienne pour ses enfants,accroître son épargne et acheter les fournitures scolaires de ses enfants.
texts.en:
This group was created on May 30th, 2007. Its members are all from the same village, and their main activity is the production of bananas.

Mrs. AISSATOU is the leader of the group. She is sitting at the far left in the photo, with her right hand raised. She is 36 years old and married with three children aged 7 to 15, one girl and two boys. 

She buys and sells bananas. She has extensive experience in this type of activity. She typically visits the weekly market to buy 50 kg of bananas for 16,500F for resale.

Her goals are to ensure that she can feed her children and buy their school supplies, and to increase her savings.

loans.use: to buy bananas for resale.

loans.name: Sinou Khaly Pc 1 Group

texts.fr: Ce groupe crée depuis le cycle un du banc villageois est composé de femmes qui habitent le même village et pratiquant toutes la même activité qu'est le commerce.Elle sont unies par de bonnes relations sociales. Madame Mbène est une femme mariée âgée de 45 ans et mère d'un  enfant .Elle est membre du dit banc depuis sa création et s'active dans le commerce de légumes .Elle est debout à l’extrême droite de la photo habillé en vert un enfant au dos. Mbène dispose d'une bonne expérience dans son domaine d'activité avec son nouveau crédit de 200000 francs CFA elle  va des sacs de légumes ,oignons choux pomme de terres  qu'elle va revendre au détail au niveau du petit marché de son village. les bénéfices réalisés par son activité lui permettent de prendre en charge ses propres besoins financiers telles que ses épargnes au niveau du banc villageois et de payer la nourriture à sa famille.
texts.en: This group, created at the launch of the local banc villageois, is composed of women living in the same village. All of them have the same type of business, working as vendors. They maintain  strong social ties. Mrs. Mbène is 45 years old, married, with one child. She has been a member of the banc villageois since its creation and is a vegetable vendor. In the photo, she is standing on the far right wearing a green outfit and carrying a child on her back. Mbène has plenty of experience in this line of work. With her new loan of 20,000 West African francs she will [buy] bags of vegetables, such as onions, cabbage, and potatoes, and resell them at retail prices at the small market of her village. The revenues from this business will allow her to take care of her own financial needs, saving some money on her banc villageois account, and to pay for her family’s food.

loans.use: to buy vegetables for resale.

loans.name: Desire

texts.en:
Desire is 26 years old and is married with 3 children aged between 1 and 6 years old. He owns barber shop and he operates his business from 6 a.m. until 8 p.m. every day except on Sunday per week. He currently employs four people to help him, and he has seven years of experience in this work. 

Desire has requested a loan from Kiva lenders via Vision Finance Company in order to expand his barber shop by buying various materials like chairs, tables, etc. He plans to use any profits generated from this loan to satisfy his family's basic needs and to reinvest in his business.

loans.use: to expand his barber shop by buying various materials like chairs, tables, etc.

loans.name: Hamida

texts.en:
Hamida lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is widowed with six children, and five of her children go to school. She doesn’t take care of any additional family members. 

Hamida sells charcoal at the market, selling her products on retail basis. She has been in this business for the last 16 years and works seven days a week.  She has requested for a loan of 400,000 Uganda shillings  from MCDT – SACCO to buy more charcoal bags. 

Hamida's major business challenges are transportation and seasonality. Her goals and aspirations are to expand her business so as to serve more customers. She lives in her rented house and the family does not have access to electricity or to piped water. Her monthly expenses include school fees and rent.

loans.use: To buy more bags of charcoal

loans.name: Pagamsuren

texts.en:
Pagmasuren is 42 years old and lives with her husband and her two sons in a ger, a Mongolian yurt, in Uvurhangai province of Mongolia. Her husband's name is Sambalhundev, he is 41 years old and he started to work for a bus conductor. Her sons go to the secondary school. 

Pagmasuren started her own clothes trade business in 2004. Beside clothes trading business she also operates a grocery trading business. She has been well-experienced in both clothes trade and grocery product sales, and her local residents appreciate her as open, mild, and diligent woman. Her current monthly pay is 60,000 MNT. She is requesting 1,800,000 MNT loan to purchase more product for her grocery store business.

loans.use: To purchase more products for her grocery store business

loans.name: Serjmyadag

texts.en:
Serjmyadag is 41 years old and lives with her husband and two children in an apartment in Selenge province, Mongolia. Her husband, Buyant, is 41 years old, and he works in a hospital. Her older daughter, Dulguun, is 21 years old and she is a college student. Her younger daughter, Ariunzul, is 16 years old and she is a secondary school student. 

Serjmydag started her hairdressing business in 1988 by renting a small space. She took endless training and expanded her business bit by bit. She is planning to run a hair salon. She is a sharp and hard-working woman who says "My province is a rural area of Mongolia, therefore I need to purchase a large amount of supplies from the city". She is requesting 1,500,000 MNT to buy hairdressing equipment.

loans.use: To buy hairdressing equipment

loans.name: Akramjon

texts.ru:
Акрамчон житель города Истаравшан. Ему 42 года. Он женат. У него трое детей. Жена Акрамчона домохозяйка. Он сам имеет среднее образование. На протяжении десяти лет он занимается животноводством. Акрамчон занимается купле - продажей скота. Также он занимается посевом сельскохозяйственных культур. 
Акрамчон просит кредит для закупа минеральных удобрений и покупки корма для скота.
texts.en:
Akramjon is a 42-year-old married man. He has three children and lives in the city of Istaravshan. Akramjon's wife is a homemaker and he has a secondary education. 

Akramjon has worked in animal husbandry, buying and selling cattle, for ten years now. He also works in crop farming. Akramjon is requesting this loan to purchase mineral fertilizer and cattle feed.

loans.use: to purchase mineral fertilizer and cattle feed

loans.name: Teodora

texts.en:
Teodora is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a business selling fruits and vegetables in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 19000 through NWTF to purchase more stock to sell in her food stall. NWTF is relisting Teodora's business profile again in support of her efforts to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more stock to sell.

loans.name: Aynur

texts.en:
Bai Tushum is honored to present its loyal customer Aynur, who has been working with BT for a long time. Starting with her first loan, she was able to grow her business, get good income and support her family. 

Now Aynur is applying for a loan of 116,000 KGS to add to her assortment with new modern fabrics. Income from this loan will help Aynur to provide her younger son with a good education.

loans.use: to purchase more goods and broaden her assortment

loans.name: Tuzamurane /ksbgg Group

texts.fr:
Jean Bosco est le membre et le président du groupe Tuzamurane / Ksbgg. Le nom du groupe signifie «Les membres fusionner ».Il a 28 ans et il est marié avec 2 enfants de 4 mois à 6 ans, 1 de son enfant est scolarise. Son niveau d’éducation est Cinq ans de primaire.

Jean Bosco est agriculteur. C’est son deuxième cycle de prêt avec ACB et il dit que le crédit antérieur a aidé ses activités agricoles beaucoup et il n’a pas attendue aucunes difficultés de non remboursement du crédit. Il va utiliser son crédit afin d’acheter des fertilisants et payer la main d’œuvre. 

Pour accroitre son agriculture, il planifie de moderniser son agriculture en utilisant des fertilisant sélectionner. Dans les prochaines années, il voudrait être le grand fournisseur des tomates dans sa région. Avec les profits, il prévoit de payer le frais scolaire, médicaux de ses enfants et bâtir une maison moderne.
texts.en:
Jean Bosco is a member as well as the president of a group called Tuzamurane / Ksbgg, which means “united members”. He is 28 years old, married, and has two children, ages four months and six years.  His oldest child attends school.  Jean Bosco himself completed five years of elementary school.

Jean Bosco is a farmer, and this is his second loan cycle with ACB. According to him, his previous loan greatly helped his farming business and he had no difficulty repaying his loan. He is going to use his loan to buy fertilizers and to pay for the cost of labor. 

In order to boost his business, Jean Bosco is planning to upgrade his farming technique with the use of selected fertilizers.  In the coming years he would like to become an important tomato producer in his region.  He plans to use his profits to pay for his children's schooling fees, healthcare costs, and to build a modern house.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers.

loans.name: Duteraninkunga Group

texts.fr:
Eliab est le membre et le président du groupe Duteraninkunga. Le nom du groupe signifie «Renforçons-nous tous ensemble».Il a 43 ans et il est marié avec 6 enfants de 1 ans à 12 ans ,dont 3 de ses enfants sont scolarises.  Son niveau d’éducation est 6ième primaire.

Eliab est cultivateur de riz. C’est son troisième cycle de prêt avec ACB et il dit que le crédit antérieur a aidé ses activités de l’agriculture de riz beaucoup et il n’a pas attendue aucunes difficultés de non remboursement du crédit. Il va utiliser son crédit afin d’acheter des fertilisants et payer la main d’œuvre pour son activité d’agriculture de riz. 

Pour accroitre son agriculture du riz, il planifie d’utiliser des semences de la race sélectionner de riz. Dans les prochaines années, il voudrait devenir un grand distributeur de riz dans la région. Avec les profits, il prévoit de payer le frais scolaire et médicaux de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Eliab is a member and the president of the Duteraninkunga group. The name of the group means: «let's be stronger together». He is 43 and is married with six children between 1 and 12. Three of his children go to school. He completed the 6th grade. 

Eliab is a rice farmer. This is his third loan cycle with ACB. He says that his previous loan greatly helped his rice farming, and that he had no problems repaying the loan. He will use the loan to buy fertilizer and cover labor costs.

In order to grow his rice production, he will use pedigreed seeds. In the coming years, he would like to become a large rice distributor in the region. He would like to pay for his children's school fees and medical costs with his profits.

loans.use: to buy chemical fertilizers for his rice farming business

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Gulsana

texts.ru:
Гулсане 38 лет, замужем, имеет 5 детей. Гулсана в качестве основного источника дохода для своей семьи, занимается полеводством  и животноводством, начав этот бизнес в 1994 году  с суммы в 10,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду Гулсаны в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний  день имеется 4 дойных коров с приплодом, ежемесячная прибыль от хозяйства составляет около 10,000 сом (KGS). Также Гулсана с июня по ноябрь с семьей выезжает на пастбище, где обрабатывает 5 га арендованной земли с  ореховым садом, получая сезонную прибыль. 
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Гулсана обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 60,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку скота – молодняка для откорма и перепродажи.  Доходы от кредита Гулсана планирует вкладывать в развитие бизнеса посредством увеличения поголовья племенного скота.
texts.en:
Gulsana is a 38-year-old married woman with five children. As her family's main source of income, she works in crop farming and animal husbandry. She started her business in 1994 with 10,000 som. Thanks to persistent hard work, today Gulsana has four dairy cows and their offspring on her farm. Her monthly profit is around 10,000 som. Additionally, from June to November Gulsana cultivates walnut trees on five hectare of rented land and gets a seasonal profit. 

With the goal of long term business development, Gulsana turned to the company "Bai-Tushum and Parnters" for a 60,000 som loan to purchase young cаttle for fattening and resale. Gulsana plans to use the extra income from this loan to increasing the number of cattle on her farm, a long-term business investment.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Tubumwe Mubikorwa / Rsz Group

texts.fr:
Jean est le membre et le président du groupe Tubumwemubikorwa / Rsz. Le nom du groupe signifie «Tous ensemble». Il a 55 ans et il est marié avec 5 enfants de 16 ans à 35 ans et deux de ses enfants sont scolarises. Il a  deux personnes dans son charge autre que ses enfants.  Son niveau d’éducation est 6ième primaire.
Jean est cultivateur de riz. C’est son quatrième cycle de prêt avec ACB et il dit que le crédit antérieur a aidé ses activités de l’agriculture de riz beaucoup et il n’a pas attendue aucunes difficultés de non remboursement du crédit. Il va utiliser son crédit afin d’acheter des fertilisants et payer la main d’œuvre pour son activité d’agriculture de riz. 
Pour accroitre son agriculture du riz, il planifie de travailler avec des forces afin d’augmenter la production de sa culture de riz. Dans les prochaines années, il voudrait devenir un grand entrepreneur et avoir son propre usine pour la récolte du riz. Avec les profits, il prévoit de payer le frais scolaire et médicaux de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Jean is a member and the president of the Tubumwemubikorwa / Rsz group. The name of the group means "all together." 

Jean is 55 years old and is married with five children, who range from 16 to 35 years old. Two of the children have been to school. Jean also supports two other people in addition to his children. He has attended 6 years of primary school. 

Jean is a rice farmer. This is his fourth loan-cycle with ACB. He says that the previous loan helped his farming a lot and that he had no difficulties with his repayments.

Jean is going to use this loan to buy fertilizers and to pay for labor on his rice farm. He plans to work with his strengths in order to increase his rice cultivation. In the coming years, Jean would like to become a successful entrepreneur and to have his own factory to harvest rice. With the profits, he plans to pay for his children's school fees and health care.

loans.use: to purchase chemical fertilizers and pay for the cost of labor.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es: Elizabeth, de 36 años es una mujer amable. Ella convive desde hace 6 años con, Yimi, su esposo. Ambos tienen 2 hijos: Dayana y Celeste a los que cuidan en una casa que alquila desde hace 5 años. Sus actividades económicas se centran en la supervisión del programa de cuidado a niños menores que promueve el estado donde ella recibe un sueldo mensual. Pero su principal trabajo consiste en la venta de dulces, bebidas y alimentos en la escuela de su localidad, donde trabaja todas las mañanas. Cuenta que le va muy bien en su trabajo, pues obtiene ingresos diarios para su hogar. Ya por las tardes y en sus tiempos libres, se dedica a la crianza de animales menores como gallinas, cerdos y cuyes; los que enseba para luego venderlos con un mayor precio, en las ferias que se realiza en la ciudad de Pampas. Ahora desea expandir su negocio y tener mejores ganancias, pues desea brindar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.  Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “acraquia” y este es el crédito número 7 con MFP, durante este tiempo pudo obtener muchos benéficos, por ello agradece el apoyo de su asociación, donde las personas son responsables y solidarias, por esa razón promete ser puntual en sus pagos. Elizabeth, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de bebidas, dulces y demás golosinas para su venta en el cafetín de su localidad.
texts.en:
Elizabeth, 36, is a kind woman who has been with her husband, Yimi, for six years.  They have two children, Dayana and Celeste, and live in a house they have been renting for five years.  Her business activities include working as a supervisor for the minor children's care program run by the state, where she receives a monthly salary, and her main source of income which is selling sweets, beverages and food at the town school, where she works every morning.  She says work is going well and she is able to earn a daily income for her household.  In her free time, in the afternoon, se raises small animals such as chickens, pigs and guinea pigs, which she later sells at a good price at the markets in the city of Pampas.

She now wants to expand her business and increase her profit so she can give her family a better quality of life.  She belongs to the communal bank "Acraquia" and this is her seventh loan through MFP.  During this time she has been able to obtain good earnings, so she is grateful for the association's support.  She believes people there are responsible and supportive, so she is committed to paying her loan back on time.  Elizabeth will use the money to buy beverages, candy and other sweets to sell at her stall.

loans.use: To buy beverages, candy and other sweets to sell.

loans.name: Krubo

texts.en: Krubo lives in Gbarnga. She is 28 years old, married and has three children between 6 and 15 years old that are in school and live at home. Krubo is a college graduate, and her husband is a agriculturalist. Since 2006, she has been running a pharmacy in her community. Krubo says one of the problems she faces is that most of her demands from her costumers are not available in her pharmacy. She is requesting a loan to purchase more stock (acetaminophen, quinine, ibuprofen, etc.) for her pharmacy. In the near future she want to send her children to college and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stock (acetaminophen, quinine, ibuprofen, etc.) for her pharmacy

loans.name: Comfort

texts.en:
Comfort, 32, is single with two children aged 6 and 13. All of them live in Sinkor, and the children are attending school. 

For the past 10 years, she has been operating a provision shop where she sells soft drinks, bread, toothpaste, mayonnaise, bath soap, washing soap, hair grease and many other items. She learned to sell from her mother. She started this business with a little amount that she had saved in a savings club. 

She is requesting this loan to purchase more soft drinks, bath soap, bread, toothpaste and mayonnaise for the business. Her plan for the future is to build a house.

loans.use: to purchase more soft drinks, bath soaps, bread, toothpaste and mayonnaise for the business.

loans.name: Siah

texts.en: Siah is 23 years old and lives in Airport. She is single and has two children, ages one and two-years-old. For the past five years Siah has been operating a video club in her community. She earns a lot of profit because she shows quality movies and has a lot of customers. She is requesting a loan to purchase more movies, CDs, DVDs, and TVs for her business. She hopes to build a house and expand her business in the near future

loans.use: to purchase more movies, CDs, DVDs, and TVs for her business

loans.name: Angela Del Socorro

texts.es: Doña Angela trabaja como conserje en una empresa privada hace muchos años, sus créditos  los ha utilizado para el mejoramiento de su vivienda, actualmente solicita otro préstamo para realizar divisiones en el interior de su casa, en este caso cuartos para poder tener privacidad y mantener en orden sus cosas e ir ordenando un poco mas su casa, por lo que necesita comprar materiales de construcción como bloques, cemento, alambre de amarre, arena, piedrines y hierro; Con todas estas herramientas podrá levantar la obra de construcción, todo esto para el beneficio de su familia y sentirse en un ambiente más agradable a como debe de ser.
texts.en: Angela works as a concierge for a private company, where she has been for several years.  The loans she has received have been used to renovate her house; and she is now requesting another one to create separate spaces inside the home, such as room for more privacy and to keep things better organized around the house.  The construction materials she needs to buy are bricks, cement, wire, sand, gravel and iron.  With these items she can begin construction.  This will benefit her family as they will be living in a much more comfortable environment.

loans.use: To buy bricks, cement, wire, sand, gravel and iron.

loans.name: Aydee

texts.es: Aydee, de 40 años es una mujer trabajadora. Vive junto a su esposo Elmer y sus 2 hijos en la casa que compró hace 20 años. Su día se centra en el cuidado de sus animales, posee 4 vacas lecheras de buena raza, las cuales cuida con mucho esmero pues depende mucho de la alimentación del día, la cantidad de leche que brindará, según menciona extrae un promedio de 20 litros de leche diarios que comercializa a los distribuidores de la zona. Como es una mujer del campo comparte su tiempo con la agricultura, sembrando maíz y papa en sus terrenos agrícolas, de donde obtiene alimentos para su consumo y si siembra en cantidad, comercializa las cosechas en su mismo terreno o en ocasiones al mercado mayorista de la ciudad más cercana. Ahora ella desea mejorar sus ingresos económicos, cuidado la calidad de sus sembríos y animales. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “acraquia” y este es el crédito número 4 con MFP, durante este tiempo pudo obtener muchos benéficos, por ello agradece el apoyo de su asociación, donde las personas son responsables y solidarias, por esa razón promete ser puntual en sus pagos. Aydee, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra fertilizantes naturales para esparcir entre sus sembríos, asimismo comprará comida balanceada para sus animales.
texts.en:
Aydee, 40, is as hard-working woman who lives with her husband, Elmer, and their two children in the house they bought 20 years ago.  Her day focuses on taking care of her animals.  She has four, purebred dairy cows that she spends a lot of time on, because the amount of milk they give daily depends on their feed.  She says she gets an average 20 liters of milk a daily which she sells to the area distributors.  She also works in agriculture and grows maize and potatoes on her farmland.  The crops she grows are for her own consumption and, if there is extra quantity, to sell at harvest time on the land or at the wholesale market in the nearest city.

Now she is wanting to increase her income, and take care of the quality of her crops and livestock.  She belongs to the communal bank "Acraquia" and this is her fourth loan through MFP.  During this time period she has been able to obtain a good profit, so she is grateful for the association's support.  She believes people there are responsible and supportive, so she is committed to paying back the loan on time.  Aydee will use the money to buy natural fertilizers to spread on her crops, and balanced feed for her animals.

loans.use: To buy natural fertilizers and animal feed.

loans.name: Irma

texts.es:
Irma, de 37 años es una mujer alegre. Vive en compañía de Gregorio, su esposo desde hace 8 años. Ambos tienen 3 hijos menores a los que cuidan en la casa que compró hace un año. La actividad que desarrolla es múltiple. Cuenta que durante las mañanas trabaja en una casa donde cocina y limpia, ya por las tardes en la construcción de una nueva universidad, donde la paga el estado un sueldo mensual por sus servicios de limpieza. Pero la actividad que nunca deja de desarrollar es la agricultura. Siembra maíz, cebada y papa en sus terrenos agrícolas que son propios. En cada cosecha y después de mucho cuidado, los comercializa al mercado mayorista de su localidad, donde aprovecha para vender los animales que cuida, entre vacas, cerdos, ovejas y gallinas. Le gustaría dedicar su tiempo a esto, pero como ella dice “son inversiones a largo plazo”. Por ello tiene que generar ingresos que le permita solventar los gastos de alimentación y estudios para sus hijos. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “acraquia” y este es el crédito número 3 con MFP, durante este tiempo pudo obtener muchos benéficos, por ello agradece el apoyo de su asociación, donde las personas son responsables y solidarias, por esa razón promete ser puntual en sus pagos. 
Irma; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de varias ovejas para aumentar su ganado.
texts.en:
Irma, 37, is a cheerful woman who has been with her husband, Gregorio, for eight years.  They have three minor children who they care for in the home they bought a year ago.  She is involved in several activities, and says that in the morning she works at home cooking and cleaning.  In the afternoon she works at the new university building site where she earns a monthly salary for her cleaning services.  But the activity she never abandons is agriculture.  She grows maize, barley and potatoes on her own farmland.  After putting much care into the crops at harvest time she sells her produce at the local wholesale market, where she also takes advantage to sell the animals she raises, such as cows, pigs, sheep and chickens.  She would like to spend more time on this, but says "the investments are long-term".  Therefore she must generate enough income to cover food and education costs for her children.  She belongs to the communal bank "Acraquia" and this is her third loan through MFP.  In this time she has been able to make a good profit, so she is grateful to the association, where people are responsible and supportive.  That is why she is committed to paying back the loan on time.

Irma will use the loan to buy several sheep to increase her livestock.

loans.use: To buy sheep.

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es: Carmen, de 33 años es una mujer sabia. Vive en compañía de Luis, su esposo desde hace 11 años. Ambos tienen 4 hijos, todos ellos menores de edad, a los que cuidan en la casa que heredó de sus padres, donde habita desde que nació.  Como mujer del campo, ella se dedica a la crianza de ganado vacuno y ovino. Tiene 7 vacas, que le proporcionan 10 litros de leche diarios, con ello realiza queso para venderlos a los comercializadores que la visitan continuamente, pues conocen del buen queso que ella prepara. Ya tiene 10 años de experiencia no solo en la ganadería también, en la agricultura, pues siembra maíz, papa, alverja y trigo en sus 6 parcelas de terreno productivo, los cuales cuida con mucho amor, “estar en el campo me gusta”, afirma contenta. Pero en temporada de buena cosecha, cuando la tierra da buenos frutos, ella lleva sus alimentos a la ciudad de Huancayo, donde le pagan mayor precio y si tiene buen capital, aprovecha para comprar más vacas que engorda para luego venderlas, es así que siempre tiene ingreso, pues su lema es “invertir”. Él pertenece al banco comunal “san miguel de huallhua” y este es el crédito número 8 con MFP, durante este tiempo pudo obtener muchos benéficos, por ello agradece el apoyo de su asociación, donde las personas son responsables y solidarias, por esa razón promete ser puntual en sus pagos. Carmen, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de una vaca lechera de raza.
texts.en:
Carmen, 33, is a wise woman who has been with her husband, Luis, for 11 years.  They have four minor children who they care for in the house she inherited from her parents and where she has lived since she was born.  She is a farmer who raises cattle and sheep.  She has seven dairy cows that give her 10 liters of milk a day, which she uses to make cheese to sell to the merchants who are constantly visiting the area because they are familiar with the cheese she makes.  

She has ten years' experience, not only in livestock farming but in agriculture as well, growing maize, potatoes, peas and wheat on the six patches of land she has and which she cares for with much love.  "I like working on the farm", she says cheerfully.  In times of good harvest, when the land produces quality crops, she takes her produce to the city of Huancayo where they pay her a higher price.  If she has money she takes advantage to buy more cows to fatten and sell.  This is how she earns an income and her motto is "Invest".  She belongs to the communal bank "San Miguel de Huallhua" and this is her eighth loan through MFP.  During this time period she has been able to earn a good profit, and is grateful for the association's support.  She believes the people there are responsible and supportive, so she is committed to paying back the loan on time.  Carmen will use the loan to buy a purebred dairy cow.

loans.use: To buy a cow.

loans.name: Nivardo

texts.es: NIVARDO  ES UNA PERSONA MUY JOVEN DESDE MUY PEQUEÑO  EMPEZÓ A TRABAJAR EN LA AGRICULTURA CON SUS PADRES DONDE FUE APRENDIENDO A CULTIVAR ZANAHORIA, CEBOLLA Y FREJOL DURANTE  EN EL TIEMPO QUE CRECIÓ. NIVARDO VIVE EN LA  COMUNIDAD DE TABOADA QUE SE ENCUENTRA A 10 KILÓMETROS DE LA  PROVINCIA MIZQUE DEL DEPARTAMENTO  DE COCHABAMBA, CON  21 AÑOS DE EDAD TIENE UN PRECIOSO HIJO NIVARDO DESDE MUY PEQUEÑO POR LA POBREZA Y  ABANDONO DE SUS PADRES EMPEZÓ A TRABAJAR EN LA AGRICULTURA COMO JORNALERO ESTA ÉPOCA POR EL DESASTRE NATURAL DE LA SEQUIA SU PEQUEÑA PARCELA DE CEBOLLA NO MADURO BIEN, ESTE DESASTRE LE HIZO FRACASAR EN SUS INGRESOS ECONÓMICOS QUE EL ESPERABA. POR LA DISTANCIA Y LEJANÍA  DE SU COMUNIDAD DEL PUEBLO VINO VIVIR A LA PROVINCIA Y BUSCAR UNA MEJOR COMODIDAD DE VIDA PARA TODA SU FAMILIA EN EL LUGAR DONDE VIVE SOLO COSECHAN UNA SOLA VEZ AL AÑO EN SU LUGAR NO CUENTAN CON RIEGO TIENEN QUE ESPERAR LA ÉPOCA DE AGUACERO PARA SEMBRAR SUS PRODUCTOS CON EL ESFUERZO DE SU TRABAJO Y CON EL  CRÉDITO QUE ESTÁ SOLICITANDO EL DESEA TRABAJAR INDEPENDIENTEMENTE Y PARA COMENZAR NECESITA COMPRAR  ABONO ORGÁNICO Y SEMILLAS PARA Y DE ESA MANERA MEJORAR SU  CALIDAD DE VIDA.
texts.en: Nivado is a young person who started farming with his parents when he was a very young boy. He learned to grow carrots, onions and beans during his childhood.  Nivardo lives in Taboada community, 10 kilometers from Mizque province in Cochabamba department.  At 21 years of age, he has a beautiful son.  Owing to poverty and the neglect of his parents, Nivardo started working as a farm laborer at a very early age.  Owing to natural disaster (drought) Nivardo's small plot of onions did not ripen well.  This disaster meant that he failed to earn what he was expecting.  Owing to the distance and remoteness of his community, he came to live in the province, seeking a better standard of living for his whole family.  In the place where he lives, they only harvest their crops once a year.  They do not have irrigation and have to wait for the rainy season to grow their crops.  Through his own effort and the loan that he is requesting, Nivado would like to work independently. In order to begin, he needs to buy organic fertilizer and seeds.  In this way, he will improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer and seeds

loans.name: Rosa Elvira

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal 30 de Agosto se reúne en la parroquia Picoaza de la ciudad de Portoviejo. Lugar conocido por ser una zona muy comercial, por sus fiestas tradicionales de San Pedro y San Pablo y por la alegría de su gente.

En este lugar vive la señora Rosa, tiene 51 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos  mayores de edad, una de ellos aun vive en su casa. Su esposo trabaja para el Estado.
 
Ella con la intención de ganar algo por su cuenta y con esto poder salir adelante se dedica a la venta de ropa de todo tipo y de calzado, su forma de  venta es puerta a puerta y también vende en su  casa donde tiene unas vitrinas para exhibir su mercadería. Trabaja todos los días, deja a crédito y cobra cada quince días. Su mercadería  la va a comprar a  Guayaquil cada vez que necesita. Tiene cinco años que se dedica a esta actividad y le va muy bien.

Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar más mercadería como: pantalones, blusas, camisetas y calzado. Está en el Banco Comunal desde el inicio  y le gusta porque los créditos le permiten financiar su negocio.
 
Su sueño es tener un gran local en el centro de la ciudad.
texts.en:
The 30 de Agosto community bank meet in Picoaza parish, in the city of Portoviejo.  This area is known for its commerce, for its traditional San Pedro and San Pablo celebrations and for the cheerfulness of its people.

This is where Rosa lives.  Rosa is 51 years old, married, and has three adult children from her relationship.  One of her children [a daughter] still lives at home.  Her husband works for the State.

With the aim of earning some money herself so that she can make progress in life, Rosa sells all kinds of clothing and footwear.  She makes her sales door to door and also sells from home where she has some display cases for her merchandise.  She works every day.  Rosa leaves her goods on credit and collects payment every two weeks.  She buys her merchandise in Guayaquil whenever she needs to.  She has been in this business for five years and is doing very well.

Rosa will use this loan to buy more merchandise such as: pants, blouses, t-shirts and footwear.  She has been a member of her community bank since the beginning and she likes it because the loans allow her to finance her business.  Her dream is to have large business premises in the city center.

loans.use: to buy pants, blouses, t-shirts and footwear

loans.name: Angela Ramona

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal 30 de Agosto se reúne en la parroquia Picoaza de la ciudad de Portoviejo. Lugar conocido por ser una zona muy comercial, por sus fiestas tradicionales de San Pedro y San Pablo y por la alegría de su gente.

En este lugar vive la señora Angela, tiene 51 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene cuatro hijos mayores de edad, una de sus hijas aun vive en su casa además de 4 nietas que estudian en colegio y escuela. El marido es comerciante. 

Ella tiene un negocio de venta de pollos asados, para lo cual alquila un local en el centro de Picoaza, allí trabaja todos los días pero en las tardes y noches que es cuando más clientes llegan hasta su local, allí además de vender pollos asado también vende aguado de menudencia el cual es muy apetecido por sus clientes, bebidas, jugos y gaseosas, ella trabaja con la ayuda de su hija, lleva más de 10 años con este negocio el cual le ha permitido salir adelante.

Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar gaseosas, jugos, pollos y varios viveres necesarios para preparar los alimentos. Está en el Banco Comunal desde el inicio  y le gusta porque el grupo es muy unido y confiable.
 
Su sueño es tener un local propio ya que se le va buena parte de sus ganancias en pago de arriendos.
texts.en:
The 30 de Agosto community bank meet in Picoaza parish, in the city of Portoviejo.  This area is known for its commerce, for its traditional San Pedro and San Pablo celebrations and for the cheerfulness of its people.

This is where Angela lives.  Angela is 51 years old and lives with her common-law husband.  She has four adult children from her relationship.  One of her daughters still lives at home along with 4 granddaughters who are attending school.  Her husband is a salesman.

Angela has a business selling grilled chicken.  She rents premises in the center of Picoaza and works there every day.  She has most customers in the afternoons and evenings.  As well as selling her grilled chickens, she also sells 'aguado de menudencias' (a traditional chicken and rice stew) which her customers really enjoy, drinks, juice and soda.  Her daughter helps her in her work.  Angela has been in this business for more than 10 years and it has allowed her to make progress in life.

Angela will use this loan to buy soda, juice, chickens and other supplies she needs to prepare her food.  She has been a member of her community bank from the beginning and she likes it because the group is very united and trustworthy.

Angela's dream is to own her own premises because she spends a large part of her profits on paying rent.

loans.use: to buy soda, juice, chickens and supplies

loans.name: Consuelo Margarita

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal 30 de Agosto se reúne en la parroquia Picoaza de la ciudad de Portoviejo. Lugar conocido por ser una zona muy comercial, por sus fiestas tradicionales de San Pedro y San Pablo y por la alegría de su gente.

En este lugar vive la señora Consuelo, tiene 43 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen un hijo de 12 años que estudia en colegio. Su esposo es comerciante.
 
Ella es una muy buena esposa que para ayudar a su esposo realiza el crédito para que él lo utilice en su negocio, el cual se dedica a la venta de productos para el hogar como: planchas, platos, ollas, licuadoras, entre otros productos, él todos los días se desplaza a otras ciudades en especial a los campos lugares donde más ventas realiza,  deja a crédito y cobra cada ocho días, lleva más de 20 años dedicado a este tipo de negocio  con lo cual ha sacado adelante a su familia.
 
Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar planchas, licuadoras, ollas, platos, entre otros productos que vende. Está en el Banco Comunal desde el inicio  y le gusta porque con los créditos ella puede ayudar a su esposo. 

Su sueño es tener un local en el centro para que su esposo no tenga que salir ya que esos es cansado y a veces peligroso.
texts.en:
The 30 de Agosto community bank meet in Picoaza parish, in the city of Portoviejo.  This area is known for its commerce, for its traditional San Pedro and San Pablo celebrations and for the cheerfulness of its people.

This is where Consuelo lives.  Consuelo is 43 years old, married, and has a 12-year-old son who is in school.  Her husband is a salesman.

Consuelo is a very good wife who, in order to help her husband, is taking out a loan for him to use in his business.  He sells home products such as irons, plates, pans, blenders, etc.  He travels every day to other towns, especially to the rural areas where he makes most of his sales.  He sells on credit and collects payment once a week.  He has been in this type of business for more than 20 years and it has allowed him to provide for his family.

Consuelo's husband will use this loan to buy irons, blenders, pans, plates and other products that he sells.  Consuelo has been a member of her community bank since the beginning and she likes it because the loans enable her to help her husband.  Her dream is to own premises in the city center so that her husband doesn't have to go out to sell his products because it is tiring and sometimes dangerous.

loans.use: to buy irons, blenders, pans, plates, etc.

loans.name: Dolgorsuren

texts.en: Mrs. Dolgorsuren, 44 years old, lives with her two daughters in Uvurhangai province of Mongolia. Her daughters are secondary-school students. Dolgorsuren is an announcer at the central market, locally known as the black market.  In addition, she does secretarial service and sells stationery. Her business is sustainable. She needs 3,000,000 MNT to purchase new equipment for making public announcements. She is a hard-working and hilarious woman who says ''My older daughter will soon go to college. So I have to prepare for my daughter's tuition.''

loans.use: To purchase new equipment for making announcements

loans.name: Givaasuren

texts.en:
Mrs. Givaasuren lives with her son and daughter in a small house in the Chingeltei district in the capital city of Mongolia, Ulaanbaatar. Her daughter, Hannorjin, is 26 years old. Her son, Otgonbayar, is 15 years old. He is a secondary-school student.  

Mrs. Givaasuren started her business of producing Mongolian national and buriad shoes and felt slippers in 2010.  She sells the shoes at market and her daughter helps. Mrs. Givaasuren makes the Mongolian national and buriad shoes and felt slippers at home.  She is planning to build a shop for her business. She is asking for a loan of MNT 700,000 to buy raw materials for her business.

loans.use: To buy raw materials for her business

loans.name: Angela Eva

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal Nuevo Amanecer se reúne en el sitio Bajo de Montecristi en la provincia de Manabí, es un pequeño lugar rodeado de mucha vegetación, sus habitantes se dedican a diferentes ocupaciones como comerciantes y empelados de fabricas.

En este lugar vive la señora Ángela, tiene 76 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen doce hijos todos mayores de edad, uno  de ellos aun vive con ella. Su esposo ya está mayor y no trabaja.

Ella para salir adelante junto a su familia y al ver que su esposo ya no trabaja hace mas de 16 años con los ahorros que tenia y con la ayuda del primer crédito que recibió del banco surtió una pequeña tienda en su casa, la misma que con la ayuda de los créditos que luego recibió la ha ido aumentando, en la actualidad sus clientes pueden encontrar de todo en su local en el cual vende productos, como arroz, azúcar, aceites, detergentes, así como también ciertos artículos de bazar y papelería, trabaja todos los días desde las 7h00 hasta las 20h00, su hijo y  esposo  le  ayudan en su negocio el cual le da lo necesario para salir adelante.

Este crédito lo va a emplear en surtir mas su tienda, va a comprar arroz, azúcar, aceite, detergentes, embutidos y otros productos de primera necesidad. Es socia fundadora del Banco comunal hace más de 16 años y le gusta porque con el primer crédito le ayudo a empezar su negocio.

Sus sueños son tener buena salud y seguir adelante.
texts.en:
The Nuevo Amanecer community bank meet in Bajo de Montecristi, in Manabí province.  This is a small place which is surrounded by a lot of vegetation.  The local people work in different jobs as salespeople and factory workers.

This is where Ángela lives.  Ángela is 76 years old, married, and has twelve grown-up children.  One of her children still lives with her.  Her husband is  elderly and does not work.

In order to provide for her family and because her husband hasn't worked for more than 16 years, Ángela used some savings that she had and her first loan from her community bank to stock a small store in her home.  With subsequent loans, she has expanded the business.  Now her customers can find everything they need in her store.  She sells products such as rice, oil and detergents.  She also sells stationery and other miscellaneous products.  She works every day, from 7.00am to 8.00pm.  Her husband and son help her in the business and it provides them with enough money to support themselves.

Ángela will use this loan to further stock her store.  She will buy rice, sugar, oil, detergents, sausages and other basic goods.  Ángela is a founding member of her community bank which was set up 16 years ago.  She likes it because the first loan she received helped her to start her business.  Her dreams are to enjoy good health and continue making progress.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, oil, detergents, sausages and other basic goods

loans.name: Ulziiburen

texts.en:
Mrs.Ulziiburen is 38 years old and lives with her husband and her two children in a ger,  a traditional Mongolian yurt, in the Bulgan province of Mongolia. Her husband, Duijhorol, helps her with her clothing business.  Her older daughter goes to secondary school and her younger daughter attends kindergarten. 

Mrs.Ulziiburen started her own clothes trade business in 1994. Today, she sells ready-made women's and children's clothes imported from China.  She is applying for a 3,600,000 MNT loan to buy a supply of chic brand-name clothes. Mrs.Ulziiburen is an ethical and hard-working woman recognized by customers, local residents, women and children.

loans.use: To buy a supply of chic brand-name clothes

loans.name: Narcisa Angela

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal Nuevo Amanecer se reúne en el sitio Bajo de Montecristi en la provincia de Manabí, es un pequeño lugar rodeado de mucha vegetación, sus habitantes se dedican a diferentes ocupaciones como comerciantes y empelados de fabricas.

En este lugar vive la señora Narcisa, tiene 39 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen dos hijos, uno mayor de edad y una de 16 años que estudia en colegio, ambos aun viven con ella. Su esposo es chofer.
 
Ella aprendió belleza en un Instituto en la ciudad de Manta hace varios años atrás, aprovechando sus conocimientos en belleza y arreglo personal realiza todo tipo de trabajos de belleza, trabaja en su casa y a domicilio si alguno de sus clientes así lo solicitan, realiza tinturados, cortes de cabello, pintado de uñas, entre otras cosas. Ella también se dedica a la venta de productos Avon y Yanbal (productos de belleza, cosméticos, perfumería y accesorios para damas), productos que vende al mismo tiempo que realiza sus trabajos. Trabaja todos los días y a la hora que sus clientes requieran de sus servicios, lleva 6 años dedicada a esta profesión y le va muy bien.

Este crédito lo va a emplear para comprar ciertas herramientas de belleza, además de tintes, permanentes, cosmético entre otras cosas.  Está en el Banco Comunal hace 4 años  y le gusta por la ayuda que le brindan los créditos.
 
Su sueño es llegar a tener salón de belleza con todo.
texts.en:
The Nuevo Amanecer communal bank meets in Bajo de Montecristi in th eprovince of Manabí. It is a small place surrounded by a lot of vegetation. Its residents work in different areas, such as being merchants and working in factories.

Narcisa lives there. She is 39 years old. She is married and has two children. One is grown and the other is 16 and goes to school. They both live with her, and her husband is a driver. 

She learned about beauty in an institute in the city of Manta some years ago. To take advantage of her knowledge of beauty and personal appearance, she does all kinds of salon work in her house and at her customers' houses if they ask her. She colors hair, cuts hair, does manicures, and more. She also sells Avon and Yanbal products (beauty products, cosmetics, perfumes, and women's accesories). She sells these products at the same time that she does her other work. She works every day at whatever time her customers need her services. She has done this for 6 years and it is going well for her.

She is going to use this loan to buy certain salon tools as well as dyes, permanents, cosmetics and more. She has been in the communal bank for 4 years and she likes it because they give her loans. 
 
Her dream is to have a salon with everything.

loans.use: to buy salon tools, dyes, permnents, cosmetics, etc.

loans.name: Vidalia Del Carmen

texts.es:
Doña Vidalia tiene 42 años de edad. Ella se dedica desde hace varios años al comercio de frutas y a la agricultura, oficio que aprendió de su madre. Vidalia vive junto a su esposo y sus cuatro hijos con los que trabaja en la recolección de frutas de temporada. Ella y su familia empiezan sus labores a las 4:30 a.m. a  y las concluyen al mediodía, ya que después sus hijos asisten a la  escuela y Vidalia junto a su esposo se dirigen a vender la fruta. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo es, para comprar tres vacas lecheras. Con las nuevas vacas, podrá obtener leche para vender y elaborar queso. A fin de obtener mejores ingresos económicos; su objetivo es construir su casa de ladrillo, debido a que la que tiene esta muy deteriorada y desea que sus hijos tengan un mejor lugar para vivir.
texts.en:
Vidalia is 42 years old. For several years she has sold fruit and worked in agriculture. She learned it from her mother. Vidalia lives with her husband and thier four children, who she works with when harvesting the fruit in season. She and her family start working at 4:30 a.m. and end at noon. Afterwards, her children go to school and Vidalia and her husband go to sell the fruit. 

The loan she is asking Fundación Campo for is to buy three dairy cows. With the new cows, she will obtain milk and make cheese in order to improve her income. Her objective is to build a brick house. The house she has is very deteriorated and she wants her children to have a better place to live.

loans.use: to buy three dairy cows.

loans.name: Edyth

texts.es:
La señora Edith tiene 53 años de edad, es casada y tiene tres hijos ya mayores de edad. 

Desde hace 10 años administra su propia tienda de productos de primera necesidad: como frijoles, arroz, aceite, huevos, pan, maíz, entre otros. Recientemente, esta iniciando con el negocio de medicina natural en las comunidades aledañas. 

Los productos los compra cada 8 y 22 días a las tiendas mayoristas, le toma una hora en trasladarse al lugar donde realiza las compras. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo es, para comprar productos para surtir más su tienda y medicina natural. Así, podrá vender más ya que solo dos tiendas existen en la comunidad y viven más de 100 familias en ella.  Su deseo, es construir una habitación más a su casa y comprar un terreno para su ganado.
texts.en:
Edith is 53 years old. She is married and has three grown children.  

For 10 years, she has run her own store selling basic necessity products, such as beans, rice, eggs, bread, corn and more. Recently, she has started a natural medicine business in neighboring communities. 

She buys her products ever other week from wholesale stores. It takes her an hour to get to the place where she does her purchases.

The loan she is asking Fundación Campo for is to buy products to stock her store more as well as natural medicines. This way, she can sell more, since there are only two stores in her community and more than 100 families live there. She wants to build one more room on her house and buy some land for her cattle.

loans.use: to buy products to stock her store and natural medicine items.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy a lot of shoes for resale.

loans.name: Gwiza Group

texts.fr:
Divine fait partie du groupe Gwiza et  habite à  Bujumbura. C’est une veuve de 30 ans .Elle a 2 enfants âgés de 4 à 7 ans, l’aîné étudie.
Elle  prend soin de 2 personnes.

Elle fait le commerce de  patates douces, de pommes de terre, de bananes,… depuis  14  ans. 

Elle  est à son sixième  crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’elle obtient, elle va  augmenter son capital et acheter  beaucoup de  patates douces, de  pommes de terre, de bananes,...à revendre, pour gagner plus. 

Dans les prochaines  années, elle voudrait  avoir une boutique, construire une maison en matériaux durables et voir ses enfants étudier.
texts.en:
Divine is part of the Gwiza group and lives in Bujumbura. She is a 30-year-old widow and has 2 children, aged 4 and 7. The eldest child goes to school. She also takes care of two more people.

Divine has been selling produce like sweet potatoes, potatoes and bananas for 14 years. This is her 6th loan from Turame. The Kiva-sponsored loan will increase her capital and allow her to buy a large amount of sweet potatoes, potatoes and bananas for resale, so that she can earn more. In the coming years, she would like to own a shop, build a house from durable materials and see her children get an education.

loans.use: to buy a large amount of sweet potatoes, potatoes and bananas for resale.

loans.name: Tièssiri Group

texts.fr:
Mariées toutes dans des familles nucléaires, les quatre femmes du groupe Tièssiri ont en moyenne 37 ans et 4 enfants. Elles habitent toutes au quartier Missira dans la ville de Ségou et se sont connues à travers des liens de voisinage, de parenté et de leurs activités génératrices de revenu. Elles font l’achat et la vente du bois de chauffe, du piment, du citron et du gombo. 
Dans le souci de satisfaire les besoins de leurs clientèles de plus en plus croissants, les membres du groupe ont décidé d’intégrer le programme crédit de Soro Yiriwaso  avec qui, elles sont à leur 2ème cycle de prêt solidaire.
Diani (femme debout au milieu sur la photo) est une grande vendeuse de condiments de toutes sortes. Elle compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter 30 seaux de piments avec les producteurs au marché de Médine. Elle effectue ses ventes en détail au comptant et à crédit à une clientèle composée majoritairement de femmes, à domicile et au marché Médine. Avec ce prêt, Diani espère réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 25.000 FCFA qui sera utilisé pour être réinvesti dans l’activité et prendre en charge certains besoins du foyer.
texts.en:
Married and living in families comprise of their husbands and children, the four women forming the Tièssiri group are on average 37 years old and have four children. They all live in the Missira neighborhood in the city of Ségou, and met through neighborhood links, family links or common income generation activities.
